function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Variability in disease monitoring techniques and resources","Impact":"Inaccurate surveillance data, leading to a delayed or ineffective response to infectious diseases","Mitigation":"Investing in standardized surveillance techniques and increasing resources for public health services","Technologies":"Standardized surveillance tools, data analytics software","People":"Public health officials, policy makers","Owner":"Government, international health organizations"},{"Description":"Bias, resource insensitivity, and high costs in existing surveillance methods","Impact":"Underrepresentation of specific populations, inadequate response to disease outbreaks, and financial strain on public health systems","Mitigation":"Implementing technology-driven surveillance methods, addressing resource disparities, and cost-effective surveillance strategies","Technologies":"Data analytics, machine learning, digital health platforms","People":"Public health officials, epidemiologists, data scientists","Owner":"Public health agencies, international health organizations"}]}
